title: Einsatzgruppen trial
data: SS Gruppenführer ; member of the SD ; commanding officer of Einsatzgruppe D

commuted to 15 years ; released 9 January 1954 ; died 1981

commuted to 15 years ; released 30 September 1952 ; died 1975
